abstract: The actress will be honored for lifetime achievement.
snippet: The actress will be honored for lifetime achievement.
lead_paragraph: Alfred Hitchcock was one of the first to see Shirley MacLaine's cinematic appeal, casting her in his 1955 film, "The Trouble With Harry." Now, with more than 50 Hollywood movies to her name, Ms. MacLaine will receive the lifetime achievement award from the American Film Institute, which will be presented at a gala tribute in Los Angeles on June 7, the BBC reported.

headline.main: American Film Institute to Give Award to Shirley MacLaine
